short_desc: Offers electricity rate reduction on monthly PG&E bill for households of three or more who meet income qualifications
description: Offers electricity rate reduction on monthly PG&E bill for households of three or more that meet income and other eligibility guidelines. PG&E bill must be in applicant's name and individual must live for more than half the year where the savings will be received. Discount applies for two years. Three months before discount expires, letter and recertification application will be sent to customer who must re-apply for recertification.
